com.example.ecom.controller

Class AdminPageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.ecom.controller.AdminPageController

  • public class AdminPageController
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all administrative operations of the e-commerce platform, including product management, seller and customer views, order handling, and admin authentication.

    This controller facilitates workflows such as viewing seller/product lists, approving/revoking permissions, managing cancellation requests, and processing admin login sessions.

    Since:
    2025-06-07

      • LoginAdmin

        public java.lang.String LoginAdmin(java.lang.String aname,
                                   java.lang.String apass,
                                   ModelMap model,
                                   HttpSession session,
                                   HttpServletRequest request)
        Authenticates the admin credentials. On success, initializes session and redirects to home. On failure, displays error on login page.
        Parameters:
        aname - admin username
        apass - admin password
        model - Spring model for passing error message
        session - HTTP session
        request - HTTP request
        Returns:
        redirect to admin home or back to login page
